author: paras@getbindu.com
name: ai-breakup-recovery-agent
description: An AI-powered multi-agent system designed to support users through emotional recovery after a breakup. The team consists of specialized agents—Therapist, Closure Writer, Routine Planner, and Brutal Honesty Advisor. The system utilizes vision capabilities to analyze chat screenshots for deeper emotional insights.

environment_variables.description: Google Gemini API key for LLM calls and vision analysis
OpenRouter API key for text-only fallback
Mem0 API key for memory operations
